summary: VIN [XXX] FORD.  THE ENGINE AIR FILTER SYSTEM FILLS WITH WATER WHEN DRIVING IN THE RAIN.  THIS CAUSES THE ENGINE TO MISS FIRE AND TRY TO STALL.  THIS COULD EVENTUALLY DESTROY THE ENGINE. THIS COULD BE VERY DANGEROUS WHEN DRIVING IN HILLY COUNTRY. IN RAINY WEATHER IT COULD NOT PULL THE HILLS ON I-70 AND I-15 IN COLORADO AND NEVADA RESPECTIVELY.   *LA    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
